short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension removes the obnoxious youtube propoganda banner being selectively shown on certain videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
youtube has been showing annoying banners that appear on selective content on their site.  If you're tired of that and and just want to watch videos in peace, this extension will remove them for you.

Icons made by www.flaticon.com
